text:
#HeroOfTheDay : Junghee Ahn, #RN at Grand River Hospital (GRH)

Junghee, retired GRH nurse of 25 yrs, came out of retirement to assist w/#vaccine  efforts b/c when the pandemic hit, her immediate reaction was to help in any way she could.

#retiredhero #HealthcareHeroes #COVID19 https://t.co/ZVmQlY9JAI
